articles.description: Europe will trot out the same foursomes, while the U.S. looks for a spark from their stars
articles.content: The 2023 Ryder Cup has all the makings of a blowout as Europe commands a 6.5 to 1.5 lead matching the all-time Day 1 margin at this event. The strategy is clearly not broken for the home team, so the… [+4541 chars]

articles.title: European countries smash September temperature records - CNA
articles.description: PARIS: Austria, France, Germany, Poland and Switzerland announced their hottest Septembers on record on Friday (Sep 29), in a year expected to be the warmest in human history as climate change accelerates. The unseasonably warm weather in Europe came after th…

articles.title: These 6,000-year-old sandals found in a Spanish cave are Europe’s oldest shoes - CNN
articles.description: New analysis has identified the oldest shoes ever discovered in Europe, according to a study published this week in the journal Science Advances.
articles.content:
New analysis has identified the oldest shoes ever discovered in Europe, according to a studypublished this week in the journal Science Advances.
